description: Vadodara Vibes: a soundtrack for winding Sabarmati lanes, royal palaces, street chai and dusk markets.

items.name: Shree Aksharpurushottam Swaminarayan Temple
items.location_hint: Swaminarayan Marg, Kakaji Lane, Ashok Vihar Ph III, Delhi

items.name: Kirti Mandir
items.description: Kirti Mandi, also regarded as Kirti Stambh or the Temple of Fame is the testimonial of Gaekwads. It is located in the city of Vadodara and was built in the year 1936 in order to celebrate the Diamond Jubilee of Maharaja Sayajirao Gaekwad III.
items.location_hint: Kirti Mandir, Kothi Rd, Dak Bunglaw, Sayajiganj, Vadodara, Gujarat

items.name: Kashi Vishwanath Mahadev Temple
items.location_hint: Jawahar lal Nehru Marg, Navapura, Vadodara, Gujarat

items.name: Shri Surya Narayan Temple
items.description: The temple is one of the monumental architecture piece in the history of archaeology. It is situated at The temple was built in the memory of Surya, the hindu god of sun. The existence of the temple can be dated back to the 17th century. The construction of the temple was initiated during the reign of Shri Govindrao Gaekwad. The temple was fabricated by Raoji Aapaji Deewan.
items.location_hint: Block N 2, Mohan Garden, Razapur Khurd, Delhi

items.name: Tapovan Mandir
items.location_hint: Gujarat Refinery Rd, Sector-1, Petrochemical Twp, Undera, Vadodara, Gujarat

items.name: Kayavarohan Temple
items.description: Kayavarohan Temple is another masterpiece surfacing from the list of famous temple in Vadodara. It is regarded as one of the 68 teerthas and is one of the most important temples in Vadodara. The temple holds an important significance to the Pasupatas, ardent followers of Lakulish. The temple has faced the wrath of destruction many times by the hands of marauder Mahmud of Ghazni. In the 20th century, the temple was resurrected and restored by Yogacharya Swami ji Kripaluanandji Maharaja.

items.name: Nilkanth Dham Swaminarayan Temple
items.description: Located on the bank of river Yamuna, Nilkanth Dham Swaminarayan Temple in Vadodara is situated at Poicha village at about a distance of 80 kms from Baruch and a total of 60 km from Vadodara. The beguiling architectural masterpiece encompasses acres of land. It is regarded as one of the most celebrated pilgrimage centers across Gujarat. The divinity of the place can be experienced by visiting Sahajanand universe and Nilkanth dham.

items.name: Kuber Bhandari Shiva Temple
items.location_hint: Karnali Village Taluka Dabhoi, PS, Chandod, Gujarat

items.name: Dhundiraj Ganpati Temple
items.description: Built in the year 1844, The double storeyed temple was fabricated Gopalrao Mairal, a dirwan during the reign of Ganpatrao Gaekwad of the Maratha dynasty. The Maratha clan worshipped Lord Ganesha as their ishta devta. It is one of the oldest temples to exist in the state of Gujarat. The loud and vibrant donning of colors elaborated the floral motifs etched all over the architectural piece.
